title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a weapon in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website offers you an interpretation of dream weapons. It is famous for weapons used in wars and guarding. There are various types of weapons, such as machine guns, pistols, missiles, and bombs. Sleep is one of the visions that are usually found in some people's dreams. That is why we have collected for you, dear God, all the testimonies and interpretations related to seeing a machine gun in a dream in full, and we have also collected for you the complete interpretation of a weapon in a dream for married adults and pregnant women. Women. Men on the lips of scholars interpret dreams. If you are interested in the full interpretation of seeing weapons in a dream, follow the article. Why dream of a weapon by Ibn Sirin? The dreamer saw himself in a dream loaded with a gun and people were looking at him, and this indicates the presence of a large number of envy and hatred towards him in his life. Also disarming the dreamer in this dream It shows the weakness and poverty that his country suffers from. Why dream of a gun in his hand is one of the visions that may indicate some of the dreamer’s problems. Seeing a full machine gun in a dream - to family problems and disputes. See also: Why dream of seeing a bomb in a full dream? Why dream of a gun for a public woman? It may indicate Seeing a gun in a dream indicates that a woman has great self-confidence and endures difficulties with strength. A gun in a girl’s dream says that she loves purity and good morals. Seeing a white gun in a dream that is loaded means that a lot of money will come to the girl in her life. It could be a spear in a woman’s dream. Alone is a sign that some problems will arise with her and she will have to face some difficulties. Also, the bulletproof armor in the dream indicates her marriage to a high-ranking man. See also: Why does Officer Kamel dream in a dream? Why does a married woman dream of a rifle? For a married woman, a rifle in a dream is a sign On stability and comfort. And swords in a dream indicate purity, morality and religion. To dream of a heavy weapon for a married woman means separation from the one she loves. What is the dream of an automatic rifle and shooting in a full dream, suggests that they may face some kind of family problems. Why dream of seeing a woman’s gun Pregnant. The interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about a pregnant woman having a gun indicates that she is in good health and is easy to give birth to. What is the interpretation of seeing a black gun indicating recovery from diseases. But hearing the sound of bullets in a dream could be a sign of the seriousness of the matter, and God knows best. Seeing A guard full of bullets in a dream means comfort, luxury, and a feeling of security. See also: Why dream of a full sword in a dream? Why does a man dream of a gun? A single young man who saw his girlfriend carrying a gun in a dream indicates a separation between them. Moreover, if a man sees himself carrying a gun among many People who do not carry weapons, this indicates that he will gain great status and power. Seeing many weapons in a dream filled with a sick person can mean death, but God knows best. Seeing completely destroyed weapons in a dream indicates the occurrence of some kind of family problem. See also: Why dream of seeing war? If you have a dream and want to...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a window or a window in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a window for a single woman. A window for single women. This means her marriage to a young man she loves. If the window is open, this means good and renewed hope for the girl. Interpretation of dreams for someone looking out the window and the girl knows him and she was talking to him about Bashar about her marriage to him. If the girl looks out the window and talks to someone Anonymous, then this is good news about an upcoming wedding. Interpretation of a dream about closing a window and if she is engaged, this means canceling the engagement. If the girl is not engaged, then seeing the open window means marriage or work. Looking out the window and seeing a lot of good things, in reality, they get On a wonderful source of livelihood. A dream of seeing a window for a married woman. Sarah heard news from people close to her, perhaps from her family. An open window for a married woman means the arrival of long-awaited news. If a married woman suffers from childbearing for a long time, the net result means relief and pregnancy. Close the window It means that her husband is leaving her or traveling. A dream window for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of seeing a window for a pregnant woman means that the pains of childbirth are minor, and childbirth is easy. Seeing an open window means that the child is free of diseases. If a pregnant woman looks out the window and sees a child with beautiful features, then in reality She enjoys it as she saw it. Interpretation of a dream about a window for a man. Interpretation of opening a window in a dream means that this person fulfills his dreams. If he sees himself looking out the window, this means success in his professional life. If the view from the window is bad, there is no good in it, and he may hear unpleasant news that will make him sad. His heart. If this man sees the sea from the window, this is a sign that he is traveling to a place where the sea actually exists. Interpretation of a dream about a broken window. Interpretation of seeing a broken window or being kicked out of one’s place means failure in the things you intend to do, and commentators considered that seeing the ugly scene means Loss and failure in life. Be very careful, because these disagreements can lead to divorce. Therefore, a broken window for a married or unmarried young man means failure. A married person may lose his job or find major obstacles among his colleagues or managers at work. Also, if an unmarried woman is in a relationship with a young man, and that relationship is innocent and she wants to get married, then the broken window means that this young man is not doing well in it. If you have a dream and want to know the interpretation, you can send the dream to the Shamloul website team by commenting below the article where it will be Interpretation of the dream and you will be answered in a short time.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cocoa in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cocoa in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing cocoa in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate that the dreamer is close to her sins and repents for them. Also, seeing cocoa in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will join a new job, a prestigious position, and a person of high virtue and righteousness. And God knows best. Also, seeing cocoa in a dream may indicate that the dreamer’s upcoming affairs will be facilitated and also the removal of diseases, sorrows, sustenance and abundant money. Interpretation of drinking cocoa in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees cocoa in her dream, this indicates the end of her worries and success in her academic and professional life. And God knows best. Also, seeing cocoa in a dream can indicate the ease of life for a girl, but also the happiness and pleasure that she will enjoy a lot, and God knows best. Also, for an unmarried girl to see cocoa in a dream, it may indicate facilitating the affairs of the unmarried girl and her entry into In a prestigious and high position. Seeing cocoa in a dream for an unmarried girl may indicate her close marriage to a good man who has a high status and provides a lot of sustenance and money. Interpretation of seeing cocoa in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees cocoa in her dream, this indicates the end of her upcoming worries. And the arrival of goodness and a lot of happiness in her home. Also, dreaming of buying cocoa indicates the achievement of the goals that he seeks to achieve, and it also indicates a large amount of livelihood, and God knows best. Seeing and buying hot cocoa in a dream indicates an improvement in the life of a married woman, and a large amount of money. Money, and her husband’s entry into a good job. Interpretation of seeing cocoa in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing cocoa in a dream indicates the collapse of fears and disputes, as well as the marital happiness that the pregnant woman will see. Seeing cocoa in a dream indicates the ease of the woman’s upcoming affairs, as well as the ease of childbirth and her closeness to God Almighty, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing cocoa in a dream for a man: Seeing a sweet man in his dream, seeing cocoa, indicates the collapse of the dreamer’s worries, as well as happiness, pleasure, and happy news. Also, seeing cocoa in a dream may mean that the dreamer will enter a new job and that the nice man will marry a good girl who will do good deeds. Also, seeing cocoa in a dream can indicate the abundance of sustenance, bringing good things, and sustenance will come and you will perform many good deeds, and God knows best. Also, seeing buying cocoa in a dream indicates the death of the disease that may afflict the dreamer, as well as the coming of happiness among the family. And friends.If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a groom in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of seeing a groom in a dream and seeing a groom in a dream can indicate the marriage of an unmarried girl. Many of us have questions about seeing the groom in a dream and do not find the appropriate interpretation for it. Today we will explain the interpretation of seeing a groom in a dream for a single married, pregnant and divorced woman, the meaning of seeing a groom and the consequences of seeing a groom without a bride. Interpretation of a dream about a groom by Ibn SirinThe interpretation of seeing a groom in a dream, as Ibn Sirin explained, indicates promotion in business and also shows power and influence. Seeing a bride And unknown grooms in a dream, this is an undesirable dream and indicates death. A person’s dream of being a groom and marrying a Christian bride in a dream, this indicates that he is searching for illusions and it is of no use to him. As for someone who sees that he is a groom and marrying a Jewish bride in a dream, this indicates that he He falls into sins and misdeeds and hinders his parents. Dreaming about seeing a groom marrying a dead woman in a dream is evidence that he will get something that is difficult to obtain. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bride in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about a groom for a single person. Interpretation of seeing a groom and joy in a girl’s dream An unmarried woman is evidence that she will achieve what she wants and aspires to. A dream about a groom who sees an unmarried girl who is sad in a dream is evidence that he is making many mistakes and needs to rethink what he is doing. Seeing a groom and an unmarried girl laughing in a dream is evidence that someone is unmarried. A modest person will propose to her and she will regret it if she gets married. Interpretation of seeing a groom for a married woman: The dream of seeing a groom in a married woman’s dream is a sign of good news for her and her family. Seeing a married woman in a dream marrying the groom she knows is evidence of increasing money and the success of her husband’s projects and collecting profits from her. A married woman who sees her groom advancing in a dream is evidence that her situation will change for the better. Interpretation of dreams to see the groom and the wedding accompanied by dancing and singing in a dream for a married woman. Evidence of the existence of a major problem for her or one of her children. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ring in a dream. Interpretation of a dream. The groom for the pregnant womanThe groom in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that she will give birth to a son. Seeing the groom in a dream for a pregnant woman means that her birth will be easy. She is also confident of her safety and the safety of her unborn child. Read also: Interpretation of dreams to see joy in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a groom for a divorced womanThe interpretation of Seeing a groom in a divorced woman’s dream is an indication that she will marry someone who will compensate her for everything. Seeing a groom present for a divorced woman in her dream is evidence that her life will change for the better. Symbol of the groom in a dream If a man sees in his dream that he has become a groom, this is a sign of his promotion in Position or obtaining a higher position. A sick person seeing that he is a groom and that the bride is unknown or dead means his end is approaching. Seeing a groom in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the goodness of her life and achieving what she desires. Seeing a groom in a married woman’s dream means hearing good news. If

title: Interpretation of a dream about sewing in a dream for a single woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about sewing in a dream: A dream is a series of fantasies that occur during sleep. Scientists differed in finding a solid theory to explain the occurrence of dreams and considered them a means that the soul resorts to to satisfy its deep-rooted desires and motives, especially when the individual cannot achieve them realistically like the scientist Freud, and many religious scholars were. She is interested in dreams and their interpretation, like Imam Ibn Sirin and others, and in this article we talk about the interpretation of a dream about sewing in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about sewing in a dream for a married womanIt can be said that many dreams were a strong incentive for innovation and achieving the goal, and perhaps the idea that entered our dreams helped in achieving achievements in life Real humanity, and many people made the dreams that came to them in a dream a door to their fulfillment. Inventions and plans. In these points, we explain the interpretation of a dream about sewing in a dream for married people: If a married woman sees sewing in her dream, this is evidence of happiness in this world and in the farms. The thread in the dream symbolizes the husband and the needle indicates her daughter. Whereas if a married woman sees herself sewing a sock This indicates her good luck, and seeing her holding the needle and making the dress is a good omen for her daughter who is about to get married. In addition, seeing a sewing machine in a married woman’s dream indicates the good news that the married woman will hear soon. As for the black thread in the dream, it is evidence of... The relationship of affection and compassion that she has with her husband, and the white thread symbolizes goodness. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing an abandoned house in a dream for a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about sewing with a needle in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. It must be noted that dreams are sure evidence of the afterlife, so sleep is less Death, then a person indulges in dreams and sees things that he admires that do not reach reality. In it, our belief in eternal life after death increases, and we present in these points the interpretation of the dream of sewing with a needle in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a needle in a dream in a man’s dream indicates the presence of a woman in his life who has good and strong feelings. The needle in a woman’s life in all circumstances indicates success in While if he sees the thread entering the needle, this is a sign of the approaching news of marriage, but if the dreamer sees that he is trying to put something other than the thread, then this is a message to him to follow the straight path and stay away from the bad deeds that he does. In addition, sewing clothes with needles and threads is a sign On friendship and closeness between people. If you see a needle without a hole in a dream, it indicates a male vision. Seeing a damaged or missing needle is a sign that the fortuneteller has missed a golden opportunity that will not be repeated again. See also: Interpretation of a dream about bathing in a dream for an unmarried woman. Married to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen Seeing someone sewing in a dream for Al-Nabulsi The interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream for Imam Al-Nabulsi is one of the signs of money and blessings that befall a person, especially in the case of lack of money and the imminent marriage of a single person. It was considered a

title: Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a black snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. A young man and a divorced woman. What is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees a black snake in a dream? A single girl who sees a black snake in a dream. Her efforts and success in escaping from it indicates that she will endure many problems and misfortunes in her life and may God facilitate her in all her affairs. Seeing one girl killing a black snake It is large in a dream and trying to get rid of it suggests getting rid of her enemies or after an unhappy marriage that almost destroyed her whole life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a snake by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a married woman who sees a black snake in a dream? A married woman seeing a black snake in a dream and its widespread presence in her home indicates There are evil people in her life who are working to destroy his life with her husband and the existence of problems between them. A married woman sees a huge black snake in a dream, and her success in killing it is the payment of all debts, the approach of forgiveness, and the end of worry. See also: Interpretation of seeing a yellow snake in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees a snake? Black in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman by a black snake in a dream. Being bitten on her hand indicates her great sadness because of the large debts she bears, with relief coming soon. Seeing a pregnant woman entering her home with a black snake and trying to kill it with a huge machine shows the end of worries, the solution of all problems, and the stability of her married life. See also Interpretation of seeing a white snake in a dream: What is the interpretation of a young man who sees a huge black snake in a dream? A young man sees a black snake in a dream. Turning around the dreamer shows that evil friends are approaching her life and trying to destroy her and harm him and his evil, while always warning him to stay away from them. Seeing a young man killing a huge snake in The dream announces his victory over the enemies of success and relieves him of his troubles and sorrows. What is the interpretation of seeing a black snake being killed in a dream? Seeing a black snake being killed in a dream indicates the elimination of his enemies, God’s satisfaction with him, and the ease of his affairs. Seeing a dream that you are killing a huge snake indicates solving problems and ending crises in life. Oneself and getting closer to comfort and feeling psychological comfort. See also: Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a black snake in the house in a dream? Seeing a black snake in the house in a dream is one of the bad dreams that indicate that the dreamer is being deceived and deceived by the people closest to him. Seeing many Of black snakes in a dream: It indicates the hatred of others against him and their false love for him. The merchant sees a black snake in his dream and it indicates a warning that he will lose his job and all his money and increase his debts. See also: Interpretation of seeing a small snake in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing a woman A divorced woman catches a huge black snake in a dream. It indicates that God stands by her side in her difficult affairs and her ability to overcome problems and difficulties in her life. The final vision of her success in killing a black snake in a dream is a sign of the end of a period of sadness and pain and the beginning of a new life with a good man who will compensate her well for his life.

title: Interpretation of the dream of giving onions in a dream to a single woman has different interpretations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing onions in a dream for single people has different interpretations. Onions are fruits that have a strong smell and taste, and many people do not like to eat or see them, and many consider them bad when they see them in a dream, but in reality there are many interpretations given by interpretive scholars about you. Seeing onions in a dream has many positive and promising meanings for the dreamer’s present and future, despite not His satisfaction with the dream. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of the dream of giving onions in a dream to individuals with different interpretations.Interpretation of the dream of seeing an onion in a dreamSeeing grilled onions in a dream is a sign for the dreamer that he will face a health problem or difficulties in life, while smelling onions in a dream symbolizes the emergence of... Divisions between family members. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an onion in a dream. If a person dreams that he got an onion in a dream, this means that there are problems between the dreamer and the person who gave him the onion and that these problems are caused by that person’s envy and hatred for the dreamer. But if the dreamer sees a raw onion that came to him from Someone's path, this means that the dreamer will emerge from a financial crisis that he was exposed to. While the husband entering his wife with onions symbolizes the upcoming difficulties in the marital life between them. As for the unmarried woman, if she dreams of someone who came to her carrying an onion, this indicates the imminence of her engagement and a love story that she will live soon. Seeing onions for a divorced woman indicates that she will enter a new stage in her life, and that she will find a man who will compensate her for her ex-husband. If a fortuneteller sees an onion in his hand and presents it to someone, this is a sign of good news in the near future related to his health condition and his recovery from an illness that befell him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing onions In a dream for a single woman, we try to provide some interpretations related to seeing onions in a dream, which we consider as follows: Seeing grilled onions is a sign of the failure of her love story. If an unmarried girl sees that her fiancé gives her an onion in her dream, this indicates the presence of problems between them, while seeing red onions is evidence of Her fiancé’s love for her and his continuous efforts to achieve her happiness. As for the green onions, it shows that the single girl has achieved a goal in life that she has always sought. But if the unmarried woman sees herself in the dining room to bring a meal of onions, this indicates that she will get married soon. When she sees herself In the market she is shopping and buying onions, this indicates that she will be exposed to some difficult situations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing chopping onions in a dream for a single woman. The great scholar Al-Nabulsi says that chopping onions in a woman’s dream indicates the failure of her love story and that she is the one who makes this decision. Also, seeing chopping onions In the dream of a single woman, it shows her strength to overcome the problems she is going through in the near future and that she is able to achieve her ambition in her work. Interpretation of a dream about buying red onions for a married woman: Red onions in a dream for a married woman indicate the earliest date of motherhood or the solution of problems she faced in the past. But if He saw this onion cooked, then this is a sign that the fetus will become healthy. Yellow onions in a married woman’s dream indicate...

title: Interpretation of dreams: My uncle got out of prison in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that my uncle was released from prison in a dream. Are you looking for what he carries? Interpretation of dreams that my uncle was released from prison in a dream. Interpretation of the dream that my uncle was released from prison in a dream can indicate goodness and happiness, God willing. If the dreamer sees his uncle leaving prison in a dream This may be a sign of relief from sadness, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees her uncle leaving prison in a dream, this may prompt him to get rid of stress, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees her uncle being released from prison, this may be evidence of... Weakness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick uncle in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a sick uncle. Perhaps the uncle’s illness and sickness lead to unpromising matters, and God knows best. In the event that the dreamer sees his uncle sick and in good health, this may be a sign of recovery, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see the illness of someone you know in a dream, it may be a sign of recovery and fatigue, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer sees an injured person With cancer, this may be a sign of his mental well-being, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about my uncle kissing me lustfully in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my uncle kissing me passionately in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing a kiss can be beneficial to the dreamer, and God knows best. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees a kiss in a dream, it can lead to goodness and benefit that she obtains, and God knows all that no one has seen. Likewise, seeing a kiss An intimate partner with lust in a dream can be a sign of achievements, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams about my cousin Yahya in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a uncle greeting me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a cousin in a dream can be a sign of kindness and living, God willing. In the event that an unmarried young man sees his cousin in a dream, he can express the new relationship, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees her cousin in a dream This may be a marriage and happy good news, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a groom in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a groom in a dream We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing someone I know as a groom in a dream may indicate good changes for the dreamer, God willing, while the groom sees an unknown person who may It leads to difficulties, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the groom marrying an unknown bride, this may lead to invalid matters, and God knows everything that no one has seen. Interpretation of dreams: An uncle giving me money in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an uncle giving me money in a dream. Seeing borrowing from an uncle can indicate To the crises and problems that the dreamer is going through, and God knows everything that we did not see. If an unmarried young man sees his uncle giving notes, this may lead to the emergence of disputes with the uncle, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees an invoice from her uncle, this may indicate She has disagreements with her uncle, and God knows best. It can also express the passing of some sudden financial crises, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about an uncle crying

title: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the lion is a gentle animal, even if it has some predatory characteristics that it inherits from its parents. Only in the interpretation books to know its correct interpretation, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a lion in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Seeing a lion may indicate the presence of traitors in the dreamer’s life or enemies and they may be thieves. The entry of a lion into a place or city is an indication of the spread of a disease in that place and his exposure to injustice. The fortuneteller’s contact with the lion without feeling fear is evidence that the fortuneteller is safe from his enemy. A lion’s attack on the fortuneteller is a sign that the fortuneteller has a fever, and the fortuneteller is harmed if he sees that the lion He rode it while he was afraid. Seeing a lion entering the dreamer’s house, this indicates the death of a sick person in the house, or the people of the house being exposed to misfortunes and disasters. Seeing a lion’s skin, cutting off its head, or removing its bones is evidence of the dreamer’s wealth, and eating lion meat is evidence of the dreamer’s defeat of his enemies. Riding A lion is a sign of escaping from danger and travel. Being able to escape from a lion is a sign of escaping illness and misfortune. Seeing a lion can be a sign of death or misfortune that will occur. Marrying a lioness is a sign of freedom from stress, misfortunes and dangers. Dream interpretation of seeing A lioness in a dream, interpreted by Ibn Sirin. A lioness is an evil woman. Eating the meat of a lioness is a sign of making money. Drinking the lioness’s milk is a sign of the victory of the enemy and the harm of good. Interpretation of dreams of seeing a lion in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Seeing a lion may mean that the dreamer gets a lot of profits and money as a result. His trade and investing his money in some projects or in his work. Whoever sees a lion in a dream will live a life full of happiness and prosperity, because the dreamer has gone through a period of strong and difficult problems and suffering. If the dreamer sees that he has found a lion or obtained it in a dream, he will obtain money and pay off the debts that He owes it to people, removes worries, solves problems, and achieves many successes, achievements and goals in his life. Seeing a young lioness indicates the passing and disappearance of crises that the dreamer is going through in his life and may indicate bad things and circumstances for the pioneer because someone is trying to harm the dreamer in his actions, and this may be so. A woman is trying to do this. Anyone who dreams of a lion and it is in his home, the dreamer will receive support and assistance from a family member, who through this support will overcome and resist the difficulties he faces. Seeing the dreamer in a dream that he is breastfeeding a lion indicates the dreamer’s wealth, charitable work, financial projects, and providing Support and assistance to whoever wants it. Seeing a pregnant lion indicates that the gender of the fetus is male. If the fortuneteller is a woman and takes care of a lion in a dream, this is evidence of caring for the children of responsible people. Interpretations differed between positive and negative regarding the interpretation of a dream about a child, because the child does not bring much Evil and evil, it is a type of black that shows many negative meanings when seen in a dream.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a chair in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi and the interpretation of a dream about many chairs.

preview.html: The chair in a dream is one of the visions that may indicate many different interpretations, for unmarried people, married people, pregnant women, divorced women, men, as well as unmarried young men, and the state of the chair that we see is also one of the most important indications. When interpreting this strange vision, it should be taken into account that when he sees it, the dreamer is surprised, so through what follows in this comprehensive article, we will learn about the most important interpretations of seeing a chair in a dream. The chair in a dream: Seeing a chair in a dream is one of the visions that carries within it positive connotations for its owner, except in Some special cases, in which case it is considered a curse for him, such as the illness of the owner of the vision, for example. , at that time a negative connotation for its owner, and this means that its interpretation is related to the state of the fortuneteller. Seeing himself sitting on a chair in a dream is an indication of profit and victory, which often awaits the dreamer in his coming days. Moreover, his wealth will rise among his peers as much as the beauty of the chair And his well-being. An unmarried young man sees in his dream that he is sitting on a chair. His vision indicates that he is approaching his marriage to a beautiful girl who will make him very happy, as beautiful as the chair is in the dream. Whether he is sick or bewitched, God forbid, the vision was an indication of the return of the distress that He suffered from it again in his life. It was also said about seeing a chair in a dream that it is a sign for the traveler to return to his homeland and settle there. The chair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a chair in a dream as a dream that carries many meanings of goodness and good reputation for the dreamer. Joy in the dreamer's heart. As for the fortuneteller who sees himself in a dream sitting in a chair, this means that he will return and settle in his family after a long absence, especially if he has been traveling for a long time and wishes to return home again. His country, his children, and his relatives... brings joy to the heart of its owner. Ibn Sirin showed, through the interpretation of the vision of falling from a chair in a dream, that it means failure and loss for the person who has the vision, and that she is one of the weak who does not have the ability to make decisions in her life, so the person who had this vision must He pays attention to her, takes her into consideration, and works to strengthen his personality with the same amendment. The interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream for an unmarried girl, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, was very promising, as it means the approach of her marriage and her connection to the one whom her heart loves and whom she often dreamed of being with. Years ago, she heard the good news that pleased her heart, and that she is one of the dreaming girls who has good morals and a good reputation among her peers. The chair in Al-Osaimi’s dream A chair in Al-Osaimi’s dream indicates achieving goals and fulfilling desires, as seeing that the person sitting on a large chair in his dream indicates that he He will reach his dreams and achieve a high position in the society in which he lives. Falling from a chair in a dream is a sign of success in work and the emergence of many problems. He sees the vision as a sign of the visionary’s failure, weakness, and inability to advance in his profession. A luxurious and valuable chair in a dream is an indication of the future. The East that awaits
